name: Beau & Bow
description:
Beau & Bow!

Play as Beau & Bow, two sweethearts that are going on an adventure!
Even if that adventure is just an excuse to get out of the house...

Use Beau's strength to carry Bow around while on your adventure, whether she wants to be carried or not!
Use Bow's flexibility to maneuver around dangerous obstacles and clear hazards!
Look out for secrets and shortcuts aplenty!
Defeat balloon creatures, called Blushies, that adapt to their environment!
Best 4 bosses in 4 themed stages and return home before supper time!

This game is a throwback to handheld platformers of the late '80s and early '90s.

The first commercial game from Studio Ten/Ten.
